posts.post_content:
I think you guys are rating this poor rhino too harshly!  
  
I agree, [Primal Huntbeast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Primal Huntbeast) is preferable, the extra ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol) in the mana cost is worth at least a +1/+1 boost, (or maybe his cost should have been ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)), but this guy would look pretty good if the Huntbeast were not around.  
  
Hexproof creatures are at their strongest in aura decks, and this guy fits nicely next to [Sacred Wolf](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sacred Wolf). You can't cast him until later in the game, but the added toughness means he'll survive a chump block or a [Pyroclasm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pyroclasm) if you can't enchant him right away. Granted, as soon as you throw a couple of umbras on these guys the difference in toughness is marginal.  
  
The flavor is also pretty amusing, a Rhino crashing through your market stall? Just an average day on Ravnica! Right up there with with [Tenement Crasher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tenement Crasher) for silly beats running rampant through the city. No clue why that makes him hexproof, but I guess that street urchin never... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
I think you guys are rating this poor rhino too harshly!

I agree, Primal Huntbeast is preferable, the extra in the mana cost is worth at least a +1/+1 boost, (or maybe his cost should have been ), but this guy would look pretty good if the Huntbeast were not around.

Hexproof creatures are at their strongest in aura decks, and this guy fits nicely next to Sacred Wolf. You can't cast him until later in the game, but the added toughness means he'll survive a chump block or a Pyroclasm if you can't enchant him right away. Granted, as soon as you throw a couple of umbras on these guys the difference in toughness is marginal.

The flavor is also pretty amusing, a Rhino crashing through your market stall? Just an average day on Ravnica! Right up there with with Tenement Crasher for silly beats running rampant through the city. No clue why that makes him hexproof, but I guess that street urchin never... (see all)

posts.post_content: That 4th point of toughness made all the difference in RTR limited. Golgari needed this guy.
